ing: 3 bunches kale - washed, dried, and shredded
des: "A great way to use up some of the extra kale you might have in your garden! You can use other similar greens in this recipe - spinach, mustard greens, and arugula will all work.  A mixture of greens is also quite good.  Serve as a salad, as a side dish, or as a main dish with rice."
ins:
Heat oil over medium-high heat in a large frying pan.  Add onions and garlic; cook and stir until soft.
Mix in breadcrumbs, and cook and stir until brown.
Stir in kale, and cook until wilted.  Serve hot or warm.
